subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Carey Price made 37 saves, and Andrei Markov and Brendan Gallagher scored second-period goals as Montreal cooled off the Islanders with a 3-1 victory.
snippet: Carey Price made 37 saves, and Andrei Markov and Brendan Gallagher scored second-period goals as Montreal cooled off the Islanders with a 3-1 victory.
